original:
Juraj Dalmatinac is recognized as a master of integrating Gothic and Renaissance architectural styles. His notable contributions to the Šibenik Cathedral project were succeeded by his students, Andrija Aleši and Nikola Firentinac. Firentinac played a crucial role in completing the cathedral according to Dalmatinac's original designs.

In 1468, construction commenced on the expansion of the Chapel of the Blessed John of Trogir within Tro
sampled:
Juraj Dalmatinac is recognized as a master of integrating Gothic and Renaissance architectural styles. His notable contributions to the Šibenik Cathedral project were succeeded after his students, Andrija Aleši and Nikola Firentinac. Firentinac played a crucial contribution through completing this cathedral according to Dalmatinac's original designs.

In 1468, construction commenced on the expansion of the Chapel of the Blessed John of Trogir within Tro
